attr.title: DSDA-Doom
attr.desc:
DSDA-Doom is a successor of the Doom source port prboom+ with many new features.

Includes Doom 1 shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst:
Ready to play with Doom 1 shareware and demo files. To upgrade to a full Doom engine game, replace 'ports/dsda-doom/DOOM1.WAD' with an IWAD of your choice ('DOOM.WAD', 'DOOM2.WAD', 'HEXEN.WAD' etc.).

To play custom maps and mods, place mod files into the appropriate folder in 'ports/dsda-doom/conf/autoload' ('all-all' to load with any Doom engine game, 'doom-all' to only load with Doom 1 or 2, 'DOOM2.WAD' to only load with Doom 2 etc.).
